title: PetyaMischa
extract: Petya and Mischa ransomware, come as a package deal, distributed by its creators, Janus. ... Petya and Mischa can also work offline, meaning they don't need to communicate back to their C&C servers, something other ransomware needs to do in order to download the encryption key.Sep 20, 2016
extract_html: Petya and Mischa ransomware, come as a package deal, distributed by its creators, Janus. ... Petya and Mischa can also work offline, meaning they don't need to communicate back to their C&C servers, something other ransomware needs to do in order to download the encryption key.Sep 20, 2016
